overview: Wow! TV's Scarlett Moffatt looks like a different person! Scarlett says "I've lost over 3 stone and dropped 6 dress sizes!"Now she'll help YOU lose up to 7 1/2 lbs in the first week with this plan. Join her and her super fit trainer Lee for...FAST FAT LOSS - full body workouts. SPEED up fat burning. SHORT WORKOUTS - between 5- 7 minutes max! FAST MOVES - no exercise lasts longer than 30" EASY DIET - SPEED UP your fat loss with this simple plan Scarlett lost 7 1/2lbs in the 1st week - see what you can do!!
title: Scarlett's Superslim Me Plan
